statements: DELETE FROM employee_training_certification WHERE certification_status = true;
DELETE FROM employee_training_certification WHERE employee_id = 100 AND certification_status = true;
DELETE FROM employee_training_certification WHERE training_program = 'Leadership Development' AND employee_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM employees WHERE first_name = 'John' AND last_name = 'Doe';
DELETE FROM employees WHERE last_name = 'Smith' AND phone_number = '123-456-7890';
DELETE FROM certifications WHERE certification_name = 'Certification A' AND expiration_date < '2023-01-01';
DELETE FROM Certifications WHERE organization = 'ABC Company' AND expiration_date < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM certifications WHERE employee_id = 201 AND certification_id = 301;
DELETE FROM certifications WHERE issuing_organization = 'ABC Corp';
